description: '''Dirty Little Rabbits''' was an American [[alternative rock]] band formed in 2007 in [[Johnston, Iowa]]. They are often referred to as a side project of [[Shawn Crahan]], a member and founder of [[heavy metal music|heavy metal]] band [[Slipknot (band)|Slipknot]]. The band has not been active since 2010. Also known as the side project of Stella Soleil of Sister Soleil fame.
